title: Herbed tuna carpaccio with pickled cucumber and bean salad
description: Thinly sliced marinated tuna makes a stunning, yet surprisingly easy starter, served with a mixed bean salad.
ingredients: 1 cucumber, halved lengthways, seeds removed, finely sliced
1 red chilli, seeded and finely sliced
½ x 400g/7oz canned mixed beans, such as borlotti beans, butter beans and cannellini, rinsed and drained
salt and freshly ground black pepper
